author: Y Combinator
description: Perplexity co-founder and CEO Aravind Srinivas believes their real advantage in the competition for the future of search with Google lies in user obsession and product taste. Even powerful distribution and domain expertise can't outweigh fundamental business dilemmas—like Google's reliance on high-margin search ads, which limit their flexibility to innovate.
title: Perplexity's competitive advantage against Google comes down to user obsession and product taste.
